context: I really liked Escape from Alcatraz (1979) any suggestions to similar things?
The Shawshank Redemption (1994) Or maybe The Rock (1996) . Nicholas Cage is in that, so it's kind of campy sometimes.
Loved both of those never opposed to good ol camp!
resp: And The Green Mile (1999) makes me cry everytime Nicholas Cage was in Con Air (1997) too. But I wouldn't call it campy
